title: Practical film making
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Julian Films, Julian Bercovici and Bill Brame
brief_description: Traces the production of an independent feature film from selection of the script to the final editing, emphasising at each step the importance of planning; gives an insight into the roles of the main crew members and practical production tips.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Julian Films, Julian Bercovici and Bill Brame
description: Traces the production of an independent feature film from selection of the script to the final editing, emphasising at each step the importance of planning; gives an insight into the roles of the main crew members and practical production tips.
